sample.name: lockedfiles.txt
sample.command: si viewsandbox --recurse --filter=changed --filter=locked:e9310750 --fields=workingrev,workingcpid,deferred,pendingcpid,type,locker,name,memberrev,locksandbox --sandbox="C:\TEMP\ideamks\sandbox\project.pj" "([\\d\\.]+)? ([\\d:]+)? ([^\\s]+)? ([^\\s]+)? ((?:sandbox)|(?:subsandbox)|(?:shared-subsandbox)|(?:shared-variant-subsandbox)|(?:shared-build-subsandbox)|(?:member)|(?:archived)|(?:variant-subsandbox)) ([^\\s]+) (.*) ([\\d\\.]+)? (.*)$" seems to be parsing this ok
sample.description: a sandbox (C:\TEMP\ideamks\sandbox\project.pj) containing files both locked in the current sandbox (c:\TEMP\ideamks\sandbox\HJF-Core\pom.xml) and some locked in another sandbox (c:\TEMP\ideamks\sandbox\HJF-Core\unittestsrc\config\persistence.properties). To know if the file is checked out in the current sandbox it is necessary to use the locksandbox field

samples.sample:
si viewsandbox --recurse --batch --fields=workingrev,workingcpid,deferred,pendingcpid,type,locker,name,memberrev,locksandbox --filter=changed --filter=changed,locked:79310750--sandbox="C:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\project.pj" a sandbox (C:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\project.pj) with out of sync members c:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\src\main\java\com\hsbc\esf\requestprocessing\flow\eventmapping\EndFlowEventMappingAction.java c:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\src\main\java\com\hsbc\esf\requestprocessing\flow\eventmapping\FlowEventMappingHandler.java c:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\src\main\java\com\hsbc\esf\requestprocessing\flow\eventmapping\FlowEventMappingUtil.java c:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\src\main\java\com\hsbc\esf\requestprocessing\flow\FlowWorkContextScope.java c:\Documents and Settings\A6253567.HBEU\sandboxes\DS2\Core\core-dev\src\main\java\com\hsbc\esf\requestprocessing\flow\PersistentWorkContextScope.java
"([\\d\\.]+)? ([\\d:]+)? ([^\\s]+)? ([^\\s]+)? ((?:sandbox)|(?:subsandbox)|(?:shared-subsandbox)|(?:shared-variant-subsandbox)|(?:shared-build-subsandbox)|(?:member)|(?:archived)|(?:variant-subsandbox)) ([^\\s]+) (.*) ([\\d\\.]+)? (.*)$" seems to be parsing this ok
